Posted By: Zach Rice
I am continuing my search for T211 Red Sun cards. I will gladly look into cards in any condition but would prefer them to be vg or less. I can buy the cards or have some items for possible trade.

Below is my "have list":


Allen
Bayless
Brooks
DeMontreville
Greminger
Hess

Rhoton
Steele

Thanks,

Zach Rice
